amendment.description: To provide for additional responsibilities for the Chief Information Officer of the Department of Homeland Security relating to geographic information.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3765 agreed to in Senate by Voice.

action.text: Amendment SA 3765 proposed by Senator Allard. (consideration: CR S10197; text: CR S10197) To provide for additional responsibilities for the Chief Information Officer of the Department of Homeland Security relating to geographic information.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3765 agreed to in Senate by Voice.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3765 proposed by Senator Allard.
